FuncDef: This command monitors arbiter statistics for a customer site.
CLIs: [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ arbiter { root | <name> } ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies statistics for an egress network queue group. Values-network.
Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters in length.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.

Specifies the name of the policer control policy arbiter. Values-An existing arbiter-name in the form of a string up to 32 characters long composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
